Label: LABEL
Definition: A definition
Value: A value

Label: Base Entities
Definition: The core entities on which longitudinal data will be collected. Each entity has a dated start and end event

Label: Location
Definition: A place to which geo-coordinates can be assigned

Label: Type (Location)
Value:
i. Dwelling. A place of residence within the boundaries of the demographic surveillance area
 ii. Clinic. A primary health care facility, without overnight facilities
 iii. Health Centre. A primary health care facility that is larger than a clinic with some overnight care facilities
 iv. Hospital
 v. Primary School. Teaching up Grade 7
 vi. Secondary School. Teaching from Grade 8 to 12
 vii. Creche. A pre-school child care facility
 viii. Police station
 ix. Tribal authority
 x. Social service office
 xi. Home affairs office

Label: Area
Definition: Village or other higher level spatial grouping of locations

Label: Coordinate
Definition: Latitude and longitude on the WGS84 coordinate system

Label: Household
Definition: A household resident at a location within the boundary of the surveillance area. A household is defined as a social group of one or more individual members. Resident household members share the same dwelling as the household, non-resident household members are individuals who do not share the same dwelling as the household, but who eat from the same pot when they are present in the household‚Äôs dwelling.

Label: Identifier (Household)
Definition: A unique household identifier which the household retains irrespective of its current residence

Label: Individual
Definition: Household members, where a resident is a member of a household who normally lives (i.e. intends to sleep the majority of the time) at the same dwelling as the household; and a non-resident is a member of a household who does not normally live at the same dwelling as the household but is nevertheless considered a member of the household.

Label: Identifier (Individual)
Definition: A globally unique identifier used internally to uniquely identify the individual

Label: External identifier (Individual)
Definition: An identifier used on data collection instruments to uniquely identify the individual, but is removed together with other personally identifiable information when data is made available for analysis

Label: Surname
Definition: Family or last name

Label: Alternative surname
Definition: An alternative surname (formerly) used by the individual, e.g. maiden name

Label: First name 1
Definition: The first given name of the individual

Label: First name 2
Definition: The second/alternative given name of the individual

Label: Civilian ID number
Definition: The 13-digit South African civilian identity number

Label: Citizenship
Definition: The country of which the individual is a citizen

Label: Nationality
Definition: The country of origin of the individual (the country of which the person is/was a citizen by birth)

Label: Sex
Definition: Male (1), female(2) or unknown(0)

Label: Birth (Individual)
Definition: The Birth event of this individual or the DeliveryEvent resulting in the birth of this individual if the individual enters surveillance through birth

Label: EndEvent (Individual)
Definition: The death event of this individual or the Observation at which this individual was last observed

Label: MotherId
Definition: The unique identifier of the mother of the individual, if the mother is enumerated in the surveillance

Label: FatherId
Definition: The unique identifier of the father of the individual, if the father is enumerated in the surveillance

Label: MotherSurname
Definition: The surname of the mother of the individual

Label: MotherFirstName
Definition: The first name/s of the mother

Label: FatherSurname
Definition: The surname of the father of the individual

Label: FatherFirstName
Definition: The first name/s of the father

Label: Events
Definition: Demographic events that delineate episodes of observation during longitudinal surveillance

Label: Migration
Definition: A change in location of usual residence

Label: Date (Migration)
Definition: Date of migration

Label: Type (Migration)
Value:
i. Internal (change of location within surveillance area)
 ii. External (change of location into/out of the surveillance area)

Label: Direction
Value:
i. In (migration into this location)
 ii. Out (migration out of this location)

Label: Origin
Definition: Origin of the migration (location)

Label: Destination
Definition: Destination of the migration (location)

Label: Unit
Definition: Individual or household

Label: Birth
Definition: The birth event of an individual

Label: Date (Birth)
Definition: Date of birth

Label: Birth weight
Definition: Birth weight as obtained from the Road to Health card in grams

Label: BirthCertificate
Definition: Whether the birth certificate was observed

Label: DateRegistered
Definition: The date on which the birth was registered, or null if the birth hasn‚Äôt been registered yet

Label: PregnancyOutcome
Definition: The end event of a pregnancy

Label: Date (PregnancyOutcome)
Definition: Date of birth

Label: Type (PregnancyOutcome)
Definition: Types i-ii is only applicable if the pregnancy end prior to the 28th week of pregnancy, types iii-v is applicable only on or after the 28th week of pregnancy
Value:
i. Spontaneous abortion
 ii. Assisted abortion
 iii. Caesarean
 iv. Assisted
 v. Normal vaginal

Label: Place (PregnancyOutcome)
Value:
i. In a health care facility
 ii. Outside a health care facility, but not at home
 iii. At home

Label: BirthAttendant
Value:
i. Doctor
 ii. Midwife
 iii. Traditional birth attendant
 iv. Lay person

Label: LiveBirths
Definition: The number of babies born alive resulting from this delivery

Label: Stillborn
Definition: The number of still born babies resulting from this delivery

Label: Death
Definition: The death of an individual

Label: Date (Death)
Definition: The date of the death

Label: Place (Death)
Value:
i. In a health care facility
 ii. Outside a health care facility, but not at home (road, etc)
 iii. At home

Label: DeathCertificate
Definition: Observed

Label: Verbal autopsy
Definition: WHO standard verbal autopsy questionnaire items. SAPRIN will adopt the worldwide standardised World Health Organisation (WHO) Verbal Autopsy questionnaires to determine the cause of deaths reported in the surveillance population. The latest version of the WHO Verbal Autopsy Questionnaire is 2016, edited and cognitively tested to facilitate the use of publicly available analytical software for assigning the cause of death.

Label: Enumeration
Definition: The initial event at enumeration of an entity. Can only be used during the base census of the demographic surveillance, or when a new area is added to the surveillance

Label: Date (Enumeration)
Definition: Date of enumeration

Label: Membership Events
Definition: A change in household membership

Label: Date (Membership Events)
Definition: The date of the change

Label: Type (Membership Events)
Value:
i. Start
 ii. End
 iii. Household dissolution

Label: Household Headship
Definition: A change in the head of the household

Label: Date (Household Headship)
Definition: The date of the change

Label: Type (Household Headship)
Value:
i. Start
 ii. End

Label: UnionEvent
Definition: A change in the union (conjugal relationship) between two individuals

Label: Date (UnionEvent)
Definition: The date of the event

Label: Type (UnionEvent)
Value:
i. Start
 ii. Marriage
 iii. Separation
 iv. Divorce
 v. Partner died

Label: Observation
Definition: A surveillance visit at a location

Label: Date (Observation)
Definition: Visit date

Label: Location (Observation)
Definition: Location where the visit took place

Label: DataCollector
Definition: The person responsible for data collection during the visit

Label: Respondent
Definition: The primary respondent at the visit

Label: Episodes
Definition: Used to record associations longitudinally between base entities. Episodes are always started and ended through events.

Label: Residence
Definition: An episode during which an individual is resident (sleeping most of the time there) at a particular location that falls within the surveillance area. An individual can only be resident at one location at a time, i.e. residency episodes cannot overlap

Label: Individual (Residence)
Definition: The individual identifier

Label: Location (Residence)
Definition: The location identifier

Label: StartEvent (Residence)
Definition: The event that started the episode, can only be Enumeration, Birth, Migration (Direction: In)

Label: EndEvent (Residence)
Definition: The event that terminated the episode, can only be Death, Migration (Direction: Out) and Observation (in which the implication is that the individual is last known to be resident)

Label: HouseholdResidence
Definition: An episode during which a household is resident at a particular location that falls within the surveillance area. A household can only be resident at one location at a time, i.e. residency episodes cannot overlap

Label: Household (HouseholdResidence)
Definition: The household identifier

Label: Location (HouseholdResidence)
Definition: The location identifier

Label: External identifier (HouseholdResidence)
Definition: The identifier associated with the household during this residence

Label: StartEvent (HouseholdResidence)
Definition: The event that started the episode, can only be Enumeration, Household formation, Migration (Direction: In)

Label: EndEvent (HouseholdResidence)
Definition: The event that terminated the episode, can only be Household dissolution, Migration (Direction: Out) and Observation (in which the implication is that the household is last known to be resident)

Label: Membership Episodes
Definition: An episode during which an individual is a member of a household. An individual must be a member of at least one household to be under surveillance. An individual can be a member of more than one household at a time (membership episodes may overlap). In the case of multiple memberships, the designated household of an individual will be the household the individual is co-resident with, ranked according to the closeness of the members relationship to the household head (self, spouse, child, grandchild, parent, sibling, other relationship)

Label: Individual (Membership Episodes)
Definition: The individual identifier

Label: Household (Membership Episodes)
Definition: The household identifier

Label: StartEvent (Membership Episodes)
Definition: The event that started the episode, can only be Enumeration, Birth or Membership start

Label: EndEvent (Membership Episodes)
Definition: The event that ended the episode, can only be Death, Membership end or Observation (implying that the membership is current)

Label: Household Head Relationship
Definition: Household head relationships are linked to a household membership and record the relationship between the individual and the head of the associated household. If the head of household change, all current household members start a new household head relationship episode

Label: Membership (Household Head Relationship)
Definition: The household membership episode associated with this household head relationship

Label: Relationship
Definition: The relationship between the individual member (to whom the membership belongs) and the current household head of the household
Value:
i. Self (the individual who is the subject of the membership is the household head)
 ii. Spouse (incl partner in stable relationship)
 iii. Child (incl adopted/foster child)
 iv. Son/daughter-in-law (incl individuals in stable relationship with any child of the household head)
 v. Grandchild
 vi. Parent
 vii. Parent-in-law (incl parent of partner in stable relationship)
 viii. Grandparent
 ix. Other relative
 x. Domestic worker or tenant
 xi. Unrelated household member

Label: StartEvent (Household Head Relationship)
Definition: The event that started the episode. Can only be Enumeration, Birth, Membership start, or Household Headship start

Label: EndEvent (Household Head Relationship)
Definition: The event that ended the episode. Can only be Death, Membership end, Household Headship end or Observation

Label: Union
Definition:
The episode during which two persons are in an informal or formal conjugal relationship. For a conjugal relationship to exist the following factors should be considered:
 i. Shelter. Do the partners live under the same roof?
 ii. Sexual and personal conduct. Do the partners have sexual relations; do they maintain an attitude of fidelity to each other; do they eat their meals together?
 iii. Services. Do they share household responsibilities?
 iv. Social. Do they participate together in social activities; does their society recognise them as a couple?
 v. Support. Do they support each other financially?
 vi. Children. Do they have children together?

Label: Individual1
Definition: The individual identifier of one of the parties to the union. By convention this will be the female in a heterosexual union.

Label: Individual2
Definition: The individual identifier of the second party to the union.

Label: StartEvent (Union)
Definition: The start of the union. Can only be Enumeration or Union start

Label: MarriageDate
Definition: The date on which the union has been formalised as a marriage

Label: EndEvent (Union)
Definition: The end of the union. Can only be Union ‚Äì partner died, Union ‚Äì separation (if there is no marriage date), Union ‚Äì divorce (if there is a marriage date), or Observation if it a current union

Label: Pregnancy
Definition: The period of being pregnant. Also used to record maternity histories retrospectively

Label: Woman
Definition: The individual identifier of the woman who experienced the pregnancy

Label: ANCVisits
Definition: The number of antenatal care visits during this pregnancy

Label: Duration
Definition: Duration in weeks of the pregnancy

Label: Outcome
Definition: A delivery event or Observation if the pregnancy is still current at the time of observation

Label: Social support
Definition: The period during which an individual receives a government social support grant

Label: Grantholder
Definition: The individual identifier of the person holding the grant

Label: Beneficiary
Definition: The individual identifier of the intended beneficiary of the grant. This may be the same as the identifier of the grant holder in the case where the holder is the beneficiary, e.g. old age pension, or different as in the case of care dependency grants, where the grant holder receives the grant on behalf of someone else, e.g. a child

Label: Type (Social support)
Definition: The type of grant
Value:
i. Old age
 ii. Disability
 iii. War veterans
 iv. Care dependency
 v. Foster child
 vi. Child support
 vii. Grant-in-aid

Label: StartDate
Definition: The start date of the social support

Label: EndDate
Definition: The end date of the social support

Label: StatusObservation
Definition: Information collected at a particular observation, valid only at the time of the observation. State may be imputed between consecutive status observations but is not known to be valid. This is in contrast with episode where the assertion is that the state represented by the episode is valid for the duration of the episode.

Label: Individual StatusObservation
Definition: A set of data elements collected about an individual either during a face-to-face visit or telephonic interview with the individual or from a proxy informant

Label: Individual (Individual StatusObservation)
Definition: The unique individual identifier of the subject of the status observation

Label: Observation (Individual StatusObservation)
Definition: The observation at which the status observation was made

Label: ResidentStatus
Definition: Physical presence in the dwelling, recorded as the number of months since the previous observation visit

Label: MotherStatus
Value:
i. Same household
 ii. Same area (village/isigodi)
 iii. Elsewhere in surveillance area
 iv. In the immediate surroundings outside surveillance area
 v. Elsewhere
 vi. Died
 vii. Unknown status

Label: FatherStatus
Value:
i. Same household
 ii. Same area (village/isigodi)
 iii. Elsewhere in surveillance area
 iv. In the immediate surroundings outside surveillance area
 v. Elsewhere
 vi. Died
 vii. Unknown status

Label: Household Status Observation
Definition: Set of data elements collected from a household informant, during a face to face or telephonic interview
